page.description: Refreshes one or more data series.

argument.name: UXDataSeriesName
argument.description: The name of a single data series specified as a string or an array of multiple data series names.

page.discussion: When a data series is refreshed, all controls bound to the data series are automatically updated. For example, if *[ui:chart1]* is bound to *[js:'series1']* and *[js:'series2']*, then refreshing *[js:'series1']* will cause *[ui:chart1]* to be updated. Since *[ui:chart1]* is also bound to *[js:'series2']*, *[js:'series2']* will also be automatically updated.
